name: Spacedew Station
description:
This is a little tech demo made by @Laguna_999, @xXBloodyOrange and me.

The idea

The year is 2080. Earth is running out of farming space and you have decided to take humanity's fate into your own hands: You start the world's first ever space farm in a low Earth orbit! 

#cowlapsejam

Controls

Base building: Press the Top Left button to enter build mode and the two other buttons next to it to select wall/floor tiles.

Press I to open the Inventory. Plant Crops in incubators and water them by pressing Space when standing next to the incubator with the watering can or the seeds in the active (rightmost) inventory slot.

Credits

PROGRAMMING:  @Laguna_999 & DevilLime

ART: @xXBloodyOrange
